ProcessTemplates.Name: JSON file to CSV file
ProcessTemplates.Description: This Process will take the contents of a JSON file. It will convert the JSON into CSV format and then write the converted data to a file.
ProcessTemplates.ProcessVariablesJson: {"InFilePath":{"Value":"\"/\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Full path of the input file to be read without filename."},"InFileName":{"Value":"\"data.json\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Name of the input file to be read."},"InServerAddress":{"Value":"\"staeasycrmprod.blob.core.windows.net\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Address of the input SFTP Server."},"InServerUser":{"Value":"\"staeasycrmprod.exampleuser\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"User for the input SFTP Server."},"InServerPassword":{"Value":"\"QSdUb/8TEREN9E8zMorDQd9QqyKJ9kIv\"","IsSecret":true,"Mode":"text","Description":"Password the input SFTP Server."},"TargetFilePath":{"Value":"\"/\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Full path of the target file to be written."},"TargetFileName":{"Value":"\"data.csv\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Name of the target file to be written"},"TargetServerAddress":{"Value":"\"staeasycrmprod.blob.core.windows.net\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Address of the target SFTP Server."},"TargetServerUser":{"Value":"\"staeasycrmprod.exampleuser\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"User for the target SFTP Server."},"TargetServerPassword":{"Value":"\"QSdUb/8TEREN9E8zMorDQd9QqyKJ9kIv\"","IsSecret":true,"Mode":"text","Description":"Password the target SFTP Server."}}

Process.Name: JSON file to CSV file
Process.Description: This Process will take the contents of a JSON file. It will convert the JSON into CSV format and then write the converted data to a file.

categoryValueRef="CategoryValue_016zo76" /><bpmn2:textAnnotation id="TextAnnotation_14sil70"><bpmn2:text>Read the JSON file from SFTP server.
Input and connection parameters are set in process variables.
In the event of a failure, Task will be retried three times before throwing an exception and ending process.</bpmn2:text></bpmn2:textAnnotation><bpmn2:association id="Association_1rvtlb7" sourceRef="Activity_08ieb5j" targetRef="TextAnnotation_14sil70" /><bpmn2:textAnnotation id="TextAnnotation_0pp5du4"><bpmn2:text>The file's content is parsed into JObject and added to a new JArray called "dataArray".</bpmn2:text></bpmn2:textAnnotation><bpmn2:association id="Association_1kmann3" sourceRef="Activity_0j6slbo" targetRef="TextAnnotation_0pp5du4" /><bpmn2:textAnnotation id="TextAnnotation_17w4x7p"><bpmn2:text>Iterating the content of "dataArray".
JSON object is flattened before added to JArray called "content".</bpmn2:text></bpmn2:textAnnotation><bpmn2:association id="Association_1bdl5k1" sourceRef="Activity_0wyt88l" targetRef="TextAnnotation_17w4x7p" /><bpmn2:textAnnotation id="TextAnnotation_1lszm5f"><bpmn2:text>Initializing JArray.</bpmn2:text></bpmn2:textAnnotation><bpmn2:association id="Association_19sazpq" sourceRef="Activity_1n3lnbw" targetRef="TextAnnotation_1lszm5f" /><bpmn2:textAnnotation id="TextAnnotation_0xo3w40"><bpmn2:text>Throw an exception if result of "Read File Contents from SFTP Server" was null, or the size of the file is less than 0 bytes.</bpmn2:text></bpmn2:textAnnotation><bpmn2:association id="Association_1xmlpvh" sourceRef="Event_0ou2vf3" targetRef="TextAnnotation_0xo3w40" /><bpmn2:group id="Group_168041r" categoryValueRef="CategoryValue_0ilgsb4" /><bpmn2:textAnnotation id="TextAnnotation_1mhnm28"><bpmn2:text>Using CSV Create Task to parse JSON to CSV.</bpmn2:text></bpmn2:textAnnotation><bpmn2:association id="Association_03cs798" sourceRef="Activity_115gayk" targetRef="TextAnnotation_1mhnm28" /><bpmn2:textAnnotation id="TextAnnotation_146nmm3"><bpmn2:text>Writing the CSV to SFTP server.
Input and connection parameters are set in process variables.
In the event of a failure, Task will be retried three times before throwing an exception and ending process.</bpmn2:text></bpmn2:textAnnotation><bpmn2:association id="Association_055cwy6"
